detail.description: Torrent Power Ltd is a leading integrated power utility company in India with presence across generation, transmission and distribution of power. Its operations are spread across the states of Gujarat, Maharashtra, Uttar Pradesh and Karnataka.[1] It is a part of Torrent Group which has presence across pharmaceutical, power and city gas distribution business.[2]
